name: Water Oozu
description: A fluid slime that surges like gentle waves.

moves.name: Bubble Burst
moves.description: Pops a jet of bubbles to splash foes.

moves.name: Tidal Tap
moves.description: Slaps with a watery tendril.

name: Fire Oozu
description: A blazing goo that radiates cozy heat.

moves.name: Ember Pop
moves.description: Flicks sparks that stick to enemies.

moves.name: Blaze Swirl
moves.description: Spins fiery goo in a wide arc.

name: Flora Oozu
description: A leafy slime that blooms with vibrant life.

moves.name: Vine Lash
moves.description: Cracks a tendril of plant goo.

moves.name: Pollen Puff
moves.description: Blows a calming cloud of spores.

name: Cold Oozu
description: A chilled slime that carries the bite of winter winds.

moves.name: Glacier Grasp
moves.description: Freezes foes with frigid tendrils.

moves.name: Chill Shatter
moves.description: Cracks frozen shards across the arena.

name: Gear Oozu
description: A mechanical slime held together by oily cogs and gumption.

moves.name: Cog Crush
moves.description: Slams rusted gears into opponents.

moves.name: Oil Slick
moves.description: Spreads a slick layer that slows enemies.

name: Lightning Oozu
description: A crackling slime that streaks with sparks.

moves.name: Volt Tickle
moves.description: Zaps foes with jittery arcs.

moves.name: Arc Snap
moves.description: Chains lightning between nearby targets.

name: Mystic Oozu
description: A shimmering slime etched with floating runes.

moves.name: Rune Pulse
moves.description: Unleashes a wave of sigil energy.

moves.name: Veil Drift
moves.description: Phases partially out of reach while striking.

name: Shadow Oozu
description: A gloomy slime that thrives in dim light.

moves.name: Gloom Swipe
moves.description: Sweeps darkness across opponents.

moves.name: Umbral Fade
moves.description: Slips behind foes for a surprise strike.

name: Spirit Oozu
description: A tranquil slime that resonates with ghostly chimes.

moves.name: Haunt Pop
moves.description: Echoes with eerie bursts that unsettle enemies.

moves.name: Soul Shine
moves.description: Bathes allies in soothing spirit light.

name: Terra Oozu
description: A sturdy slime infused with rich soil and pebbles.

moves.name: Boulder Bounce
moves.description: Launches rocky chunks with elastic force.

moves.name: Root Rend
moves.description: Snags foes with earthen tendrils.

name: Toxic Oozu
description: A caustic slime bubbling with neon fumes.

moves.name: Acid Splash
moves.description: Splatters corrosive droplets over enemies.

moves.name: Venom Drip
moves.description: Oozes poison that lingers after impact.
